name: Hummingbird (madbarron)
description:
Hummingbird

A casual stab at Ludum Dare 50: Delay the Inevitable

Controls
  • Click: flap
  • M: mute/unmute
  • R, Q, Esc: quit
Instructions
  1. Click somewhere to flap in that direction. Flapping costs energy. Click farther away to flap harder.
  2. Replenish energy by draining the color out of flowers.
  3. Eat spiders to increase your score.
  4. Eventually, you will run out of energy or get bored. Thus, the theme is realized.
Tips
  1. Be calm. Don't get going so fast that you can't slow down. Don't flap downwards; just wait for gravity to do the work for you.
  2. Spend some time at each flower to top up to full energy.
  3. Try out Pollinator Mode to practice with unlimited energy. Press R or Esc to go back to the menu.
4/16/22
  • Game Jam version
